City Parks | City of Henrietta




* [City of Henrietta](https://cityofhenrietta.com/ "City of Henrietta")
  =====================================================================

  ![City of Henrietta](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/CIty-of-Henrietta-Logo-3.jpg)

City Parks
----------



[![Henrietta Photos (Sasha)7.17.15 025 (Medium)](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Henrietta-Photos-Sasha7.17.15-025-Medium-1024x678.jpg)](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Henrietta-Photos-Sasha7.17.15-025-Medium.jpg)

Both Hapgood Park on Spur 510 and the City Park at 1000 E. Commerce have pavilion areas which are great for family gatherings or birthday events. It’s on a first come, first serve basis. No reservations required.

![](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/new-rv-park-sign-002-225x300.jpg)


Hapgood RV Park on Spur 510 has 12 parking slots and is a first come, first serve basis so no reservations required. It is $15.00 per night with full hookups and a maximum stay of 7 days.

![](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/409929042_915839436723202_2573493122288314783_n-300x169.jpg)

![](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/409920605_915839240056555_971877325507884623_n-300x169.jpg)

![20160531_124603 (Medium)](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/20160531_124603-Medium-300x225.jpg)
![20160531_115510 (Medium)](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/20160531_115510-Medium-300x225.jpg)
![20160531_120051 (Medium)](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/20160531_120051-Medium-300x225.jpg)




The Henrietta City Pool was completely updated in May 2016. Admission is $4.00. Children under 3 years of age are free. Hours are Monday – Saturday 12-5 pm. Night swims are Tuesday & Thursdays from 6-9 pm and admission is $3.00. Day swim only season passes are $65.00 and day & night swim season passes are $100.00. The FREE Splash Day is normally held on Monday, Memorial Day each year and then the pool closes down for the summer in early August to allow our lifeguards back into their school activites. Private pool rental/birthday parties, ect., are available for $200.00/2 hour minimum & $100.00 for each additional hour with a $100.00 deposit required at the time of the booking. Call 940-538-0493 for more information.  The pool is located at 1000 E. Commerce.

[![20160225_130632 (Medium)](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/20160225_130632-Medium-1024x576.jpg)](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/20160225_130632-Medium.jpg)
